comment: she is a terrible professor. her exams dont make any sense and she gives absolutely no guidelines. she has no clue what shes teaching. i do not recommend her at all

AWFUL. avoid her if possible, doesn't teach every class, picks and chooses what each class kind of deserves, grades horrible with little/vague "rubrics" refuses to answer the questions the class needs and will not work with you if you need help, her exceptions are insane this is the first time we'v ever used Photoshop/AI & doesnt care. HORRIBLE

Professor Jackson did a great job with the orientation class. There was one assignment each week that had to be under a page in length. They did not take very long and I considered them to be fun and interesting. You got to watch a short video or interview and simply write a little bit about it or answer a few questions. Very easy seven week course
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: The orientation class has more homework than her history of fashion class! video lectures (done by someone else, most of them not even working) and written assignments weekly, along with 2 major projects. all for a ONE CREDIT class?? makes no sense. Didn't even learn anything, either. useless class.

She has absolutely no knowledge of the subject she teaches. Her lectures are monotonous, she literally just reads straight from the book. The only assignments are a few quick homework and a few tests, all stolen from quizlets. It's very clear she does not care about what she teaches nor giving a good experience to the students. DO NOT TAKE HER!

She literally has no idea what she is talking about, at least in the class I had her for. And she did not even try to hide it, she read from her notes, and followed the textbook to a "T". Even then she did not explain things well, the simplest topic sounded extremely complicated and confusing. However, not much work to do, just make sure to study.
